item.title: Need coder
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

i can tell you how to code its very simple,

for adding monsters you need to go into the autospawn.cfg then go to the bottom and you should see:

[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

just above that create a new line and put:

spawn = [NPCID HERE]	[Xco-ord HERE]	[Yco-ord HERE]	0	0	0	0	0	1	[name of npc]

once you compile and run the npc will be standing still on the square u made it stand on.

for adding items you need to go into NPCHandler.Java and search for:

if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) {

in mine i see this:

if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) { } else { int NPCID2 = NPCID+34; System.out.println("Npc id =" +NPCID); if(npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null && server.playerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(NPCID)] != null) { if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(4206, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

under the last “}” add this:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == [NPCIDHERE]) { ItemHandler.addItem([ITEMIDHERE], npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, [ITEMAMOUNTHERE], GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

just change the ‘itemidhere’ ‘itemamounthere’ and ‘npcidhere’ to what ever you need

hope all of this helps you

Read full topic
